Title: Breathtaking!

This is the most beautiful dress i've ever owned. the detail is exquisite. i never write reviews and felt i had to for this dress. i love it!

the embroidery does catch on the beading so you have to handle it carefully. it's worth the special treatment, though!
Cleaned_Review_Text: beautiful dress ive ever owned detail exquisite never write reviews felt dress love embroidery catch beading handle carefully worth special treatment though

Title: Such high hopes!
Review Text: I purchased this for a very good price and i typically love maeve... should have been a win-win. the fabric is thin and slinky in the most unfortunate way. it made finding appropriate undergarments very difficult. i had to add a slip (that helped) and figured that since i'm losing weight, it would look better when i'm down a few more pounds. that being said, i didn't find it to be figure flattering. i have a tummy and there was at least one photo from the bridal shower i wore this to, where i lo

Title: Falls nicely
Review Text: I bought this dress for work and post work happy hours. love it! it's material is high quality and is flattering since it falls nicely on my postpartum figure. it's a little shorter than i thought but still appropriate for work.
Cleaned_Review_Text: bought dress work post work happy hours love material high quality flattering since falls nicely postpartum figure little shorter thought still appropriate work
